title: Every day I miss the old Fiora before the Rework...  I'm mad and upset every day about it.
body:
I feel pretty juked that Riot banned me from ranked for being so good and reworked my champ.

I feel jipped. 

I want the old Fiora back.

This one sucks. 

I hate my ult.

Don't talk to me about skill.

I was the best Fiora in all of leauges.

replies.body:
Are you STILL going insane about this? My god dude. And besides, new fiora is healthier for the game. Tell me, with a straight face, that old fiora had counterplay  when ahead, or that she had any use when behind.
And I mean BESIDES focusing her with literally everything.

Your opinions are irrelevant.  I was the best Fiora not any of you...

None of you care about Fiora.
Provide proof

They where Bronze 3 at best in season 4 on their other account [R3PORTED](http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=R3PORTED)

On [F3ORA](http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=F3ORA) Bronze 4 last season.

as someone who has played the old and the new fiora **a lot**.

the old fiora was at best a worse assassin, than an actual assassin.

your only option to make plays was to dash into the enemy team, hope you dont get exhausted before you hit r and pray that you deal enough damage with your ult that you kill someone and make it back out before you die.

gameplay wise this new fiora has a lot more options to make plays.

even if you dont agree with her new passive, you have to agree that everything else in her kit is by far the superior design.

especially the old version of riposte was pathetic and only useful to get 100 ad at level 1 and all in cheese your opponent with auto attack resets at lvl 2.
Q auto q auto R wow outplayed xdddddd
I hope Fiora's ghost haunts you every day for ruining the 1st e-sport and scares you to death.
sry im already dead because an extremely skilled player hit me with a pre rework fiora combo.

This is bait.

...Isn't it?
Yeah. It's a troll I haven't seen in a while.

I'm glad they reworked her...
Her ult was bullshit
She could do tons of damage while being untargetable and healing all of her missing health...
it wasnt, did you know if u were teemo or quinn and if u blinded her her ult did 0 damage.
Just play Master Yi, His Q is 90% the same as Fiora's old ult AND it resets.

> [{quoted}](name=Quepha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=49llFEXf,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-20T03:32:56.254+0000)
>
> Just play Master Yi, His Q is 90% the same as Fiora's old ult AND it resets.

That "Just play someone else" thing doesn't cut it with me.  I am Fiora.  The entire thing has turned me into a Sith Lord and I soon hope to obliterate the Riot nexus with a Death star from orbit.
Uh huh. Totally.

Literally on my first try on Fiora I destroyed my top lane who was a much more experienced Jax (one of Fiora's biggest counters) just because of her ult. I'm glad she's changed, everyone but old Fiora players are happy she's reworked.
I would grab you all by the throat and blade waltz your entire developer team for ruining the game.
I used to be a good person.  Now I just hate Riot for being jerks and not caring about being jerks.
My minions will put a banana in the exhaust pipe of every Riot employee's car until Fiora is rolled back and my lane will over power your team.
I just want everyone who likes to see Fiora destroyed like this that I hate you because I love Fiora.
